column1: Peritonitis is an inflammation (irritation) of the peritoneum.
Peritonitis is caused by a collection of blood, body fluids, or pus in the abdomen (intra-abdominal abscess).
The doctor or nurse will perform a physical exam.
People with peritonitis usually curl up or refuse to let anyone touch the area.
Peritonitis can be life-threatening and may cause complications.
